select * from (select rownum as rnum,n.* from (select fund_no as fundNo, fund_name as fundName, fund_category as fundCategory, fund_amount as fundAmount, fund_filepath1 as fundFilepath1, (to_date(fund_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD')- to_date(fund_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))as dateGap, nvl(sum(fpay_funding),0)as fundingSum, nvl(owner,null)as owner, floor((nvl(sum(fpay_funding),0))/fund_amount*100) as rate from fund left join fund_pay using(fund_no) left join seller using(fund_no)
where fund_category=#{category} and fund_warning < 3 and fund_end > sysdate
where fund_warning < 3 and fund_end > sysdate
group by fund_no,fund_name,fund_category,fund_amount,fund_filepath1,(to_date(fund_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD')- to_date(fund_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD')),owner order by fund_no desc)n)

select * from (select rownum as rnum,n.* from (select fund_no as fundNo, fund_name as fundName, fund_category as fundCategory, fund_amount as fundAmount, fund_filepath1 as fundFilepath1, (to_date(fund_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD')- to_date(fund_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))as dateGap, nvl(sum(fpay_funding),0)as fundingSum, nvl(owner,null)as owner, floor((nvl(sum(fpay_funding),0))/fund_amount*100) as rate from fund left join fund_pay using(fund_no) left join seller using(fund_no) where fund_warning < 3 and
fund_end > sysdate
fund_end < sysdate
and fund_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select fund_no as fundNo, sum(fpay_funding)as fundingSum from fund_pay group by fund_no

select fund_no as fundNo, member_id as memberId, fund_name as fundName, fund_amount as fundAmount, fund_fees as fundFees, fund_category as fundCategory, fund_start as fundStart, fund_end as fundEnd, (to_date(fund_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD')- to_date(fund_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))as dateGap, fund_intro as fundIntro, fund_as as fundAs, fund_like as fundLike, fund_reportcount as fundReportcount, fund_warning as fundWarning, fund_filepath1 as fundFilepath1, fund_filepath2 as fundFilepath2, fund_filepath3 as fundFilepath3, fund_filepath4 as fundFilepath4, fund_filepath5 as fundFilepath5 from fund where fund_no=#{fundNo}

mapper.insert: insert into fund_notice values( fn_seq.nextval, #{fundNo}, #{memberId}, #{fnTitle}, #{fnContent}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{fnCategory}, #{fnFix}, #{fnFilepath} )
mapper.select: select fn_no as fnNo, fund_no as fundNo, member_id as memberId, fn_title as fnTitle, fn_content as fnContent, fn_date as fnDate, fn_category as fnCategory, fn_fix as fnFix, fn_filepath as fnFilepath from fund_notice where fund_no=#{fundNo} and fn_no=#{fnNo}
mapper.update: update fund_notice set fn_title = #{fnTitle}, fn_content = #{fnContent}, fn_category = #{fnCategory}, fn_fix = #{fnFix}, fn_filepath = #{fnFilepath} where fund_no=#{fundNo} and fn_no=#{fnNo}
mapper.delete: delete from fund_notice where fund_no=#{fundNo} and fn_no=#{fnNo}
